title: Realme wonâ€™t ship a charging brick with the upcoming Narzo 50A Prime
content:
An increasing number of Android OEMs are following Apple’s move to remove charging bricks from smartphone retail boxes. Samsung was the first to follow suit with its Galaxy S21 series last year, and now Realme has announced that it won’t offer a charging brick with the upcoming Narzo 50A Prime. In a recent post on

The post Realme won’t ship a charging brick with the upcoming Narzo 50A Prime appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Realme has confirmed that it won't ship a charging brick with the upcoming Narzo 50A Prime. Read on to learn more.
